abstract: The American Booksellers Association, which represents independently owned bookstores, has sent a letter to the Department of Justice asking it to investigate the recent price war between Amazon, Wal-Mart and Target.
snippet: The American Booksellers Association, which represents independently owned bookstores, has sent a letter to the Department of Justice asking it to investigate the recent price war between Amazon, Wal-Mart and Target.
lead_paragraph: The American Booksellers Association, which represents independently owned bookstores, has sent a letter to the Department of Justice asking it to investigate the recent price war between Amazon, Wal-Mart and Target.

headline.main: Independent Booksellers Group Asks for Pricing Investigation

abstract: The retailer cut the price of the e-reader to $259, from $279, only a couple of weeks after sales began.
snippet: The retailer cut the price of the e-reader to $259, from $279, only a couple of weeks after sales began.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:13 p.m. Updated to indicate Amazon will no longer sell the original Kindle.

headline.main: Amazon Cuts Price of International Kindle by $20
